title: Adata HD720 2TB USB 3.2 External Hard Drive
cat_seo_title: ADATA Portable Hard Disk Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy ADATA Portable Hard Disk at best price in BD. Keep your precious data safe & secure by using ADATA HDD. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Adata HD720 2TB USB 3.2 External Hard Drive

The Adata HD720 is a tough external hard drive with a stylish appearance. It has a huge storage capacity and is subjected to rigorous testing for waterproofing, dust proofing, and shock resistance to provide superior data security. This external hard drive is the most durable data backup option for your next vacation!

IP68 Water and Dust Resistant Certified

The Adata HD720 external HDD has passed the rigorous IP68 certification, providing outstanding water and dust resistance. The HD720 functions normally even in a dirty environment or after being submerged in 2-meter-deep water for up to 120 minutes due to its sturdy construction.

Greater Shock Test Qualification

The Adata HD720 external HDD passed a 1.8m drop test that was more stringent than the standard military-grade (MIL-STD-810G 516.6) requirement. It can withstand a sudden collision.

Triple-Layer Protection

The HD720's triple-layer structure utilizes very elastic silicone material to provide excellent stress absorption from all angles.

Shock Sensor Protection

Shock Sensor Protection aids in the protection of your data. If your HD720 is struck, Shock Sensor Protection kicks in and displays a flashing red light. After the shock has worn off, a solid or flashing blue light indicates that normal operation has resumed.

Wrap-around USB Cable

The USB cord tucks into a wrap-around outside groove in the drive shell, creating a beautiful storage option that complements the device's very practical features. The Adata HD720 2TB External HDD comes with a 03-year warranty.

title: Adata HD710 Pro 2TB USB 3.2 Blue External Hard Drive
cat_seo_title: ADATA Portable Hard Disk Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy ADATA Portable Hard Disk at best price in BD. Keep your precious data safe & secure by using ADATA HDD. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Adata HD710 Pro 2TB USB 3.2 Blue External Hard Drive

The HD710 Pro takes external hard drive durability further. We put it through rigorous testing that goes above IP68 dust and waterproof regulations, as well as military-grade shockproofing with triple-layered protective construction. This storage survival master is your buddy in keeping content secure whether you are diving, hiking, riding, or simply taking a brief stroll. ADATA's external storage expertise results in a drive with total dust-tight protection and a submarine-like ability to survive water. The Adata HD710 Pro external HDD is tested for 60 minutes in 2 meters of water - that's more than IEC IPX8 requirements! Prepare to dive? Water protection applies in full only when the USB port cover is firmly closed

Takes shocks like a true warrior with military-grade toughness

The Adata HD710 Pro external HDD's extra-rugged triple-layered chassis protects it from shocks, drops, and vibrations. We put it through MIL-STD-810G 516.6 testing, which implies it can easily endure 1.5-meter drops. Your data is safe, so go ahead and try new things.

Exclusive Shock vibration sensing technology

Smaller external drives continue to operate even if they fall or are shocked, resulting in mistakes and damaged sectors. Jolt sensors on the HD710 Pro quickly cease all drive operations if a shock is detected. Activity restarts after the tremors have stopped completely. A visible status indication keeps you fully informed.

Ergonomic waterproof port cover

The HD710 Pro, unlike other so-called external durable drives, includes an easy-to-use USB port cover. There will be no tinkering or pressing to find the proper angle until it is finally closed. Our engineers pay close attention to detail, and the HD710 Pro's tab cover is one-touch and easy to use while remaining secure and waterproof.

Use it with Your Game Console

The Adata HD710 Pro external HDD may be attached to gaming consoles and utilized as backup storage for non-played games. The Adata HD720 2TB USB 3.2 Green External HDD comes with a 03-year warranty.
